website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable chair that gets high marks from shorter customers. Its heavy-duty design is packable but heavy, so don't plan to take it backpacking.
pros: Single fold, so it's easy to pack and transport
Heavier than other options, but that shows that it's sturdy
Some users feel it's best for those 5'5" and shorter
cons: Chair is a little lower to the ground than some prefer

customer_reviews.title: The chair is well made and sturdy and plenty wide
customer_reviews.text: The chair is well made and sturdy and plenty wide. I'm a big guy 6'3" 280+ lbs and I should've read the dimensions a little closer. It is a short sitting chair. So if you are a taller person I would recommend something taller. By no means is this the manufacturer's fault. Entirely on the buyer. I like the feature of the zipper pouch in the back to store the chairs storage bag. The cooler bag is more like a beer pouch. I used it to hold my phone. All in all this is a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and comfy to sit in - but a bit rigid
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat to sit in - as long as you are sitting upright. In that regard it is much more comfortable than your typical collapsible chair. But if you want to sit back and take a nap, there is no head or upper shoulder support at all, and you cannot 'sink down' into the chair to lean your shoulders back because then your legs are uncomfortable. If you need a solid, strong, collapsible chair for sitting up in - this is great. If you need something to sit back and relax in by the camp fire (as I did) - this is a bit too rigid and 'formed'.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair. Hard to get out of. Flimsy where it bends and folds. Broke after a month
customer_reviews.author: GLutzJr

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair it was a gift for my wife and she loves it. Says it's very comfortable but you have to be careful getting out of chair
customer_reviews.author: flasherman

customer_reviews.title: It is a little heavy so you wouldn't want to hike into anywhere with it but it's a nice chair and perfect for what we need it for
customer_reviews.text: Really soft and comfy! It has light padding. The back doesn't come up extra high but the seat is wider than usual. It is a little heavy so you wouldn't want to hike into anywhere with it but it's a nice chair and perfect for what we need it for. We'll probably order more if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great camping/gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: I use this chair mostly for when I play games, I like the fact that it has a drink holder. I’m not the biggest guy, but I’m not small by any means so the weight limits are the deciding factor when I purchased it. Feels nice and sturdy. As far as comfort, it’s about as expected. It would be nice to have more cushioning, but that would make it difficult to collapse. So, I just use a pillow. But overall, this is the second chair I’ve bought by this company and this one is an upgrade from the previous chair. I would definitely recommend for short term uses. Not for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: ShaderMatt

customer_reviews.title: So much more comfortable then a traditional camp chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is really confortable for my large hips and thighs. I don't get sore like with a traditional camp chair. I also have a larger range of movement which helps a lot. One improvement would be to somehow add lumbar support, maybe even adjustable. And, I wish it folded smaller. It folds down to about 2x the size of a regular camp chair. So worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: SmudgeArt

customer_reviews.title: Not plush, but functional and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for something with padding, which this is not. However, I was pleasantly surprised to find how easily it opens & closes, how durable It feels, and how comfortable it actually is. When I first opened the bag, I was a bit disappointed, but then I loved it as I saw how well this will fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Armand

customer_reviews.title: Kick Back Chair
customer_reviews.text: Better on my back than a regular camping chair. Cozy and laid back. A bit lower to the ground than other chairs. Older folks may need more support when standing up. Travels well and fits into the compact spaces of our RV. I’m happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Black

customer_reviews.title: A screw fell out in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I just got this chair for my birthday in June. In July one of the screws fell out and I thought it was broken but then my grandpa said he happened to find the screw on the ground. If he didn’t find it the chair would have been done. It’s very comfortable and sturdy but it didn’t last too long before something happened to it. But I really enjoy the chair and it’s great for campfires and hanging out!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Nieuwsma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for watching kids soccer games!
customer_reviews.text: Love our 2 new chairs. Extremely comfortable. They are easy to set up and also to collapse. My only complaint is that they are kinda heavy but nothing a grown adult can’t handle - still deserves 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn M

customer_reviews.title: A perfect extra chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for me and my other larger friends as well as those skinny-minis who come to visit. Very comfortable and simple to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Handles big fellas
customer_reviews.text: I use this chair for reading outside to gaming like a kid in front of the tv. I’m a big guy (350 lbs) and it handles me plopping myself into it. Bonus points for having a little pocket for my cell phone and a pocket on the back to store the carrying cover. Great product but a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, super strong, and really comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my she shed and it's perfect. I put a super furry throw (like the rugs) over it and it looks very fun and girlie. It is also very sturdy and doesn't wince or flinch at all under my 300 pounds of curves thereby proving the "heavy-duty" claim.
customer_reviews.author: Freewoman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chairs good. I ordered lots of chairs for outside use. I got a lot of roommates who tend to break every chair I buy but this one is holding up no problem. Be careful though... Sit in this chair and you might not be able to get out of it, it's pretty comfortable and easy to relax in.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair to take camping. My husband needed a camping chair for big guys and found this one to be comfortable as well as portable. It folds up for convenient storage and doesn't take up much room when packing. The vendor also followed up with an email checking on the status of delivery which I thought was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Holds 300lbs
customer_reviews.text: My family is very big boned. Finding chair's that can hold 259 and above has been difficult. This chair is magnificent, it holds 300lbs and has been fabulous. Glad I found it in time for the reunion. No embarrassing broken chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Summer B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up/pack up, super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It’s a little smaller than I expected, but it’s comfortable all the same! Everyone wanted to take their own turn on the chair during my recent camping trip. Staring at the stars has never been more comfortable! I might buy another for my boyfriend!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana avitia

customer_reviews.title: Chair is small
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the size of the chair. My husband is 6’1” and looks like a big man n a little chair. Was so excited about this heavy duty chAir to use at our camper. His favorite on final bit the dust. Was so disappointed when we pulled it from the box. Wasn’t expecting it to b that small.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Richard

customer_reviews.title: SO comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The comfiest camping chairs that I have EVER sat in! Ever. We ordered two and the whole family was fighting over who got to sit in them. They are more expensive than I really like but I would definitely order again I love them that much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it looked sturdy and it is. Very comfy and not too hard to get in and out of. I miss sitting in it though because shortly after getting it my cat stole it and won't give it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and very well made. I will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Terha

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The chair I purchased is perfect for my height. It’s comfortable & easy to carry. My cousin is going to purchase one too.
customer_reviews.author: kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Love the chairs / Construction could be better
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs - they are so comfortable to sit in. The quality and construction could be better especially for the price you pay. We have 4 chairs and the nuts have come off the bolts several times. One chair arrived missing a bolt and nut.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but smaller than it looks in photos
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable but smaller than I anticipated from the photo. I’m 5’5” and I wouldn’t recommend this for anyone taller than me. Seems well made and sturdy. It’s easy to open and close. Kinda a pain to put bag in it’s bag.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Big, but comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Great camp chair but a little heavy and bulky. But the comfort is really good!
customer_reviews.author: BallisticMD

customer_reviews.title: great collapsible chair
customer_reviews.text: Great folding chair for whatever you want to use it for! Feels sturdy when sitting in it and the drink holder is a nice option as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This chair was much smaller than I was expecting. I couldn’t even sit cross legged in it and I am not a large person. It would be good for kids or petite people.
customer_reviews.author: Matina

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and spacious for me. I am 5’4” 125 pounds and I love this chair. Easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable and sturdy chair. I was tired of the cheap ones breaking so I decided to pay extra. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: leurinimj

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this chair. We do a lot of camping and hanging out. She says it helps keep her warm and is very comfortable, she falls asleep in it. We have had no problems with it. There is another brand that is slightly larger then this one. I prefer the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and durable! I love the back pocket which can be used as cooler or just storage for miscellaneous stuff. Also, its not that difficult to put back into the carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: A L

customer_reviews.title: Just one problem
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chairs but one of the chairs the stitching was not complete it just had a string so I’m concerned that it’s going to split all the way around if someone heavy sits in it.
customer_reviews.author: darlene a greco

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: We had one that we've had for a over a year now and it's always the one that seems to be sat in when around the fire. Now we just bought another. Easy to open and close and still as compact as any other camp chair. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Donati

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I use this Chair for camping and daily at home in random places. Its comfortable and sturdy. Great choice if you are car camping but its size and weight make it unreasonable for backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping or sporting events strong enough for my 250 lb, 6'-3" husband to use
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Six

customer_reviews.title: Great for team chunk chunk
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and durable for my chunky butt. Very comfy, easy to fold and unfold. Even used it at the beach and it did well.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bentley III

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and I think they are very comfortable and they have a bag to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.F.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair .Ordered it on the reviews that the chairs is shorter .Most camp chair cut off circulation on the back of your legs .This one is very comfortable.My husband is 6.4 and he also loves the chair. Ordering more chairs .
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend. One of the most comfortable field chairs I have ever used. Made of good quality materials and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: YAGMUR SAYLAK

customer_reviews.title: Best camping chair as long as you don't get it wet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable camping chair I have ever sat in. It supports my back as well, and is very durable. The only downside is if you leave it in the rain, the cushion on the seat soaks water up and it takes forever to dry out. Other than that, this chair is top notch and a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald K. Loines Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than it looks in the pic
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very strong as the description says but it is much much smaller than the picture shows, I'm a heavyset guy only 5-9 and it barely fits me. It looked so much bigger in the pictures online.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Too small for an adult
customer_reviews.text: This chair is probably sturdy enough but it is tiny. Really tiny. I'm 5'4" and it is to short for me. Had to give to my 7 year old granddaughter it was more her size.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Comfy wide chair
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair so far. Very wide, sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: Broke on day two. Return window only 6 weeks .
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs! They are so comfortable. I have arthritic knees which makes it hard for me to sit in low chairs. These are perfect--high enough that my knees don't hurt when getting up from the chair. I would definitely recommend them, and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and sturdy and comfortable. I'm glad I bought this chair. I've had it since new year's day and I really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray86

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive sizing, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is good quality but should be marked as a child’s/teenagers chair. No person over 5’9 could really fit in this chair comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Tons of space and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: So I am a big guy. 6'4" and 225. This chair gives me plenty of room to lounge comfortably. It also gives plenty of room for my small dog to lay in my lap at whatever angle his tiny heart desires. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a slightly larger chair with more cushioning. I'm a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Axe Grinder

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this big, comfortable chair. It's light, easy to fold, and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for concerts
customer_reviews.text: Loved howco.fortable tookthemtoa concert and every one wanted to know where we got them.
customer_reviews.author: mwat

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I live on a boat and spend long hours waiting for the fish to bite . This is the most comfortable chair i have ever sat in .
customer_reviews.author: cropduster901

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to set up/take down
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are great, a big change from what we were using before and well worth it. However, on a cold evening camping, my dog took over my chair. Dog owners beware!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Best recreational chair ever super comfortable looking I've never sat ...
customer_reviews.text: Best recreational chair ever super comfortable looking I've never sat in it my wife takes it to baseball games. I think you can still sunburn in it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was nice until....
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to collapse. And plastic piece broke, of course a couple day’s outside of return window...
customer_reviews.author: Sara Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and sturdy. Seems to be well constructed; I can sit in this and have a couple kids piled in my lap without worrying about the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Della G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Opened chair up and noticed stitching string, looked closer and the stitching was undone around quarter of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Bruzzer

customer_reviews.title: Was good but broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: U bracket broke after a few months of moderate use. Generally liked it before that. Customer Service email they provide doesn't work. Will look elsewhere for my next chair.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs So far.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a musical festival for 4 days. They are comfortable but could have even more cushion to be even more comfortable. Overall very happy though
customer_reviews.author: Josh Nancarrow

customer_reviews.title: I love this camping chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this camping chair. It's so comfy. It is perfect for snuggling up in with a blanket and book...next to a camp fire.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: A+++ shipping, quality. I hesitated to pay a higher price for a camping chair BUT I was/as so happy with it that I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bigger chair then expected!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! Very large! Sturdy and comfortable. My only complaint...it would be even more comfortable if it leaned back a bit more. Other then that, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair! I especially like the larger size...very comfortable! Light weight too.
customer_reviews.author: Kd Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Porch Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, but it did need a chair seat cushion. Now it's great!
customer_reviews.author: T. Frock

customer_reviews.title: Chair
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. Only thing it does not have a pillow
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I weight about 300 and I approve this chair. So comfy
customer_reviews.author: Taso Lazaropoulos

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Really comfy! Grandson uses it as a gaming chair, cost a lot less than a gaming chair, folds up too.
customer_reviews.author: linboss

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: The thing is freaking awesome. Do yourself a gosh darn favor and buy the thing. Buy it for your brother it's a gift for the both you. Buy this thing and take it to work. Buy it and take your dog for a walk sitting. If you can take my word buy it and see for yourself
customer_reviews.author: daniel r. veeley

customer_reviews.title: Just not right for me
customer_reviews.text: The chair is really nice but iam six foot two and when I sat in it the chair it was average size for my height. Iam looking for something a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: ruben s.

customer_reviews.title: Not that comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was not as comfortable as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ashabraner

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I really like these chairs
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really like these chairs. Thay are pretty comfy and not huge and bulky which is nice for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I thought. Lower to ground and shallow seat area!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best camp chair I ever bought already sent for a second
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction!  Would give zero stars if site would allow!
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED!! Purchased product end of August used on 2 camping trips and it is already broke! It is the 8th of October and of course my return deadline was Sept. 23rd. Chair sits to low to the ground and poorly constructed. You can purchase a much better moon chair at Camping World.
customer_reviews.author: michele botley

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair and I have bought several of them
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair and I have bought several of them. Protable and comfortable for everyone, from the smallest kid to the tallest family member... we all love sitting in these! I only wish it came in more colors! I would totally keep buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: This chair is awesome but I thought it would be more padded
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome but I thought it would be more padded. The cup holder does not stand up very well. It is a nice large folding chair.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Biggers

product_meta.title: KingCamp Moon Saucer Leisure Heavy Duty Steel Camping Chair Padded Seat (Grey with Cup Holder and Cooler Bag) (Grey)
feature_bullets: Rugged steel frame design, supports up to 330 lbs; Seat height 13. 8 inches
Padded and round seat chairs provides special comfort; Durable, wear-resistant 600D oxford fabric
Cooler bag on the back keeps your drinks fresh and cool
Open and close in seconds, packed size 34. 6 × 9. 1 × 7. 9 inches, space saving; Carry bag with shoulder strap included for easy transport and store
Lifetime : We provide the best experience to all of our customers. Please feel free to let us know if you have any questions or concerns. Our chairs are lifetime
